repository.corpname: NYU Abu Dhabi, Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: NYU Abu Dhabi Student Life Events: Photos, Music, and Videos

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Programs of NYU Abu Dhabi Student Life, part of the Division of Student Affairs (previously Campus Life), include a variety of events and activities organized to cultivate engagement and inclusivity across the NYUAD campus. The Manager of Campus Facilities is part of a team of staff that advises on and arranges space and services to ensure events are successful. This includes photography and audiovisual arrangements. Historically, the Campus Facilities Managers have retained audiovisual content from events, especially in the institution's first decade.

scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: The NYU Abu Dhabi Student Life Events: Photos, Music, and Videos collection is a collection of digital images, as well as some music and video files, from a variety of student and campus events during Academic Years 2014 - 2020. The collection was maintained, organized and transferred to the University Archives by Student Affairs Facilities Manager, Declan Dowdall. Dowdall also transferred files he inherited from his predecessor, Alex Heald. Some administrative documents, such as brochures and event request forms, were included in the transfer and have been retained.

Events that are documented range from student field trips, to campus festivals, to other campus events such as Autism Awareness Week, Latino Night, Marhaba, Pakistani Mock Wedding, Staff Appreciation Day, and Defend the Nest, among others. Many of these events were, and some still are, understood as "campus traditions" during the institution's first decade.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection has been minimally processed and its original arrangement by academic year has been retained. Within AY folders, the files are listed in alphabetical order.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The collection has been minimally processed. Descriptive IDs have been added to folders for unique identification, but the files largely remain in the state they were transferred.
NYU Abu Dhabi Library follows professional standards and best practices when acquiring, processing, and preserving digital material in order to maintain the integrity of content.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This digital collection is accessible to members of the NYU Abu Dhabi community and the NYU Global Network.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) are maintained by New York University Abu Dhabi Corporation. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured. Contact nyuad.archives@nyu.edu for more information.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A draft copy of the 2013 Student Life brochure, with markups by Josh Taylor.

appraisal.head: Appraisal
appraisal.p: This document contains student PII (netID), may need to be redacted before providing access.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Images and documents maintained by the Manager of Student Life Facilities, Alex Heald, from the period 2013-2014.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: During this era, students were not yet routinely signing authorization release forms for being photographed at events, thus images from this series may not be used or reproduced without permission from NYU Abu Dhabi External Affairs and Communications.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes images from a variety of events and field trips, maintained by Student Life Facilities Manager Alex Heald.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
